games.name: Los Angeles Chargers at New England Patriots

news.headline: Sirianni defends A.J. Brown after in-game spat

news.headline: NFL wild-card playoffs: Big questions, judging overreactions

news.headline: NFL playoff wild-card game picks, predictions, schedule, odds
news.description: Aaron Rodgers vs. C.J. Stroud? Mike Tomlin vs. DeMeco Ryans? We have picks, predictions and stats to know for the last remaining wild-card game.
